text: The Arizona Wildcats football team competes in the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Football Bowl Subdivision, representing the University of Arizona. This is a list of completed seasons.College Football @ Sports-Reference.com. Retrieved 2015-Apr-12. ==Seasons== *Mackovic Fired after 5 games *Stoops Fired after 6 games ==References== Arizona Wildcats *
title: List of Arizona Wildcats football seasons
